text: terā dil narm ho gayā hai. Jab tujhe patā chalā ki maiṅ ne is maqām aur is ke bāshindoṅ ke bāre meṅ farmāyā hai ki wuh lānatī aur tabāh ho jāeṅge to tū ne apne āp ko Rab ke sāmne past kar diyā. Tū ne ranjīdā ho kar apne kapṛe phāṛ lie aur mere huzūr phūṭ phūṭ kar royā. Rab farmātā hai ki yih dekh kar maiṅ ne terī sunī hai.
